thig7.2:1.1: “I am a bhikkhunī with well-developed spiritual powers.
thig7.2:1.3: and mastered the path of peace,
thig7.2:2.1: “On whose account did you shave your head?
thig7.2:2.4: why do you roam around confused?”
thig7.2:3.3: They do not know the Dhamma;
thig7.2:3.4: they are not masters of the Dhamma.
thig7.2:4.1: But the one who was born in the Sakyan clan,
thig7.2:5.4: leading to the appeasement of suffering.
thig7.2:6.2: I dwelled devoted to the teaching.
thig7.2:6.4: and completed the teaching of the Buddha.
thig7.2:7.1: In this way all fixation is annihilated,
thig7.2:7.2: and the mass of darkness destroyed.
